018package org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.ap;
019
020import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.stream;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.SystemUtils.retrieveLocale;
029
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.io.StringReader;
032import java.util.Locale;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.SortedMap;
035import java.util.TreeMap;
036
037import org.apiguardian.api.API;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
039import org.xml.sax.Attributes;
040import org.xml.sax.InputSource;
041import org.xml.sax.Locator;
042import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
043import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;
044
045/**
046 *  The implementation for a
047 *  {@link DefaultHandler}
048 *  that handles the files for additional text resources.
049 *
050 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @version $Id: TextFileContentHandler.java 887 2021-03-28 19:25:19Z tquadrat $
052 *  @since 0.1.0
053 *
054 *  @UMLGraph.link
055 */
056@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TextFileContentHandler.java 887 2021-03-28 19:25:19Z tquadrat $" )
057@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
058public final class TextFileContentHandler extends DefaultHandler
059{
060        /*------------*\
061    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
062        \*------------*/
063    /**
064     *  The key for the current text entry.
065     */
066    private String m_CurrentKey = null;
067
068    /**
069     *  The description for the current text entry.
070     */
071    private final StringBuilder m_CurrentDescription = new StringBuilder();
072
073    /**
074     *  The locale for the current translation.
075     */
076    private Locale m_CurrentLocale = null;
077
078    /**
079     *  The current text.
080     */
081    private final StringBuilder m_CurrentText = new StringBuilder();
082
083    /**
084     *  Flag that indicates if currently a description is being processed.
085     */
086    private boolean m_IsDescription = false;
087
088    /**
089     *  The document locator.
090     */
091    @SuppressWarnings( {"unused", "FieldCanBeLocal"} )
092    private Locator m_Locator = null;
093
094    /**
095     *  The map that holds the texts. The key of this map is the locale for the
096     *  text or message translation, while the values are Maps with the text
097     *  entries itself, using the message or text id as the id.
098     */
099    private final Map<Locale,SortedMap<String,TextEntry>> m_Texts;
100
101        /*--------------*\
102    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
103        \*--------------*/
104    /**
105     *  Creates a new {@code TextFileContentHandler} instance.
106     *
107     *  @param  texts   The texts for the resources.
108     */
109    public TextFileContentHandler( final Map<Locale,SortedMap<String,TextEntry>> texts )
110    {
111        m_Texts = requireNonNullArgument( texts, "texts" );
112    }   //  TextFileContentHandler()
113
114        /*---------*\
115    ====** Methods **==========================================================
116        \*---------*/
117    /**
118     *  {@inheritDoc}
119     */
120    @Override
121    public final void characters( final char [] ch, final int start, final int length ) throws SAXException
122    {
123        if( length > 0 )
124        {
125            final var text = new String( ch, start, length ).lines().collect( joining() );
126            if( m_IsDescription )
127            {
128                if( !text.isBlank() ) m_CurrentDescription.append( text.trim() );
129            }
130            else
131            {
132                m_CurrentText.append( text );
133            }
134        }
135    }   //  characters()
136
137    /**
138     *  {@inheritDoc}
139     */
140    @SuppressWarnings( "incomplete-switch" )
141    @Override
142    public final void endElement( final String uri, final String localName, final String qName ) throws SAXException
143    {
144        switch( localName )
145        {
146            //---* The root element *------------------------------------------
147            case "texts" ->
148            {
149                m_CurrentKey = null;
150                m_CurrentDescription.setLength( 0 );
151                m_CurrentLocale = null;
152                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
153                m_IsDescription = false;
154            }
155
156            //---* A single text entry *---------------------------------------
157            case "text" ->
158            {
159                m_CurrentKey = null;
160                m_CurrentDescription.setLength( 0 );
161                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
162                m_IsDescription = false;
163            }
164
165            //---* A text resource description *-------------------------------
166            case "description" -> m_IsDescription = false;
167
168            //---* A text resource description *-------------------------------
169            case "translation" ->
170            {
171                final var translations = m_Texts.computeIfAbsent( m_CurrentLocale, k -> new TreeMap<>() );
172                translations.put( m_CurrentKey, new TextEntry( m_CurrentKey, false, m_CurrentLocale, m_CurrentDescription.toString(), m_CurrentText.toString(), ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE ) );
173
174                m_CurrentLocale = null;
175                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
176                m_IsDescription = false;
177            }
178        }
179    }   //  endElement()
180
181    /**
182     *  {@inheritDoc}
183     */
184    @Override
185    public final void ignorableWhitespace( final char [] ch, final int start, final int length ) throws SAXException
186    {
187        if( (length > 0) && !m_IsDescription )
188        {
189            stream( new String( ch, start, length ), '\n' ).forEach( m_CurrentText::append );
190        }
191    }   //  ignorableWhitespace()
192
193    /**
194     *  {@inheritDoc}
195     */
196    @Override
197    public final InputSource resolveEntity( final String publicId, final String systemId ) throws IOException, SAXException
198    {
199        InputSource retValue = null;
200
201        if( nonNull( systemId ) && "http://dtd.tquadrat.org/AdditionalText.dtd".equals( systemId ) )
202        {
203            try( final var inputStream = getClass().getResourceAsStream( "/AdditionalText.dtd" ) )
204            {
205                if( nonNull( inputStream ) )
206                {
207                    final var buffer = new String( inputStream.readAllBytes(), UTF8 );
208                    retValue = new InputSource( new StringReader( buffer ) );
209                }
210            }
211        }
212
213        if( isNull( retValue ) ) retValue = super.resolveEntity( publicId, systemId );
214
215        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
216        return retValue;
217    }   //  resolveEntity()
218
219    /**
220     *  {@inheritDoc}
221     */
222    @Override
223    public final void setDocumentLocator( final Locator locator ) { m_Locator = locator; }
224
225    /**
226     *  {@inheritDoc}
227     */
228    @SuppressWarnings( {"incomplete-switch", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent"} )
229    @Override
230    public final void startElement( final String uri, final String localName, final String qName, final Attributes attributes ) throws SAXException
231    {
232        switch( localName )
233        {
234            //---* The root element *------------------------------------------
235            case "texts" ->
236            {
237                m_CurrentKey = null;
238                m_CurrentDescription.setLength( 0 );
239                m_CurrentLocale = null;
240                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
241                m_IsDescription = false;
242            }
243
244            //---* A single text entry *---------------------------------------
245            case "text" ->
246            {
247                m_CurrentKey = attributes.getValue( "key" );
248                m_CurrentDescription.setLength( 0 );
249                m_CurrentLocale = null;
250                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
251                m_IsDescription = false;
252            }
253
254            //---* A text resource description *-------------------------------
255            case "description" ->
256            {
257                m_CurrentDescription.setLength( 0 );
258                m_IsDescription = true;
259            }
260
261            //---* A text translation *----------------------------------------
262            case "translation" ->
263            {
264                m_CurrentText.setLength( 0 );
265                final var language = attributes.getValue( "language" );
266                m_CurrentLocale = retrieveLocale( language ).get();
267                m_IsDescription = false;
268            }
269        }
270    }   //  startElement()
271}
272//  class TextFileContentHandler
273
274/*
275 *  End of File
276 */
